sourcesContent:
import { View, Text, StyleSheet, ScrollView, TouchableOpacity } from "react-native"
import { SafeAreaView } from "react-native-safe-area-context"
import { Info } from "react-native-feather"

import { theme } from "../theme"

export default function HowItWorksScreen() {
  return (
    <SafeAreaView style={styles.container} edges={["bottom"]}>
      <ScrollView contentContainerStyle={styles.scrollContent}>
        <Text style={styles.title}>How It Works</Text>

        <Text style={styles.description}>
          Our AI-powered system uses computer vision and machine learning to analyze visual characteristics of
          pineapples that correlate with sweetness.
        </Text>

        <View style={styles.steps}>
          <View style={styles.step}>
            <View style={styles.stepNumber}>
              <Text style={styles.stepNumberText}>1</Text>
            </View>
            <View style={styles.stepContent}>
              <Text style={styles.stepTitle}>Image Processing</Text>
              <Text style={styles.stepDescription}>
                We analyze color patterns, texture, and external features of the pineapple.
              </Text>
            </View>
          </View>

          <View style={styles.step}>
            <View style={styles.stepNumber}>
              <Text style={styles.stepNumberText}>2</Text>
            </View>
            <View style={styles.stepContent}>
              <Text style={styles.stepTitle}>Feature Extraction</Text>
              <Text style={styles.stepDescription}>
                Our algorithm extracts key visual indicators that correlate with sugar content.
              </Text>
            </View>
          </View>

          <View style={styles.step}>
            <View style={styles.stepNumber}>
              <Text style={styles.stepNumberText}>3</Text>
            </View>
            <View style={styles.stepContent}>
              <Text style={styles.stepTitle}>Prediction Model</Text>
              <Text style={styles.stepDescription}>
                A trained neural network predicts sweetness based on thousands of analyzed samples.
              </Text>
            </View>
          </View>
        </View>

        <View style={styles.accuracyCard}>
          <View style={styles.accuracyHeader}>
            <Info stroke={theme.colors.yellow[500]} width={20} height={20} />
            <Text style={styles.accuracyTitle}>Accuracy Information</Text>
          </View>

          <Text style={styles.accuracyDescription}>
            Our prediction model has been trained on over 10,000 pineapple samples with verified sweetness levels. The
            current model achieves 85% accuracy in predicting sweetness categories.
          </Text>

          <View style={styles.accuracyMetrics}>
            <View style={styles.accuracyMetric}>
              <Text style={styles.metricLabel}>Very Sweet</Text>
              <View style={styles.progressContainer}>
                <View style={[styles.progressBar, { width: "90%" }]} />
              </View>
              <Text style={styles.metricValue}>90%</Text>
            </View>

            <View style={styles.accuracyMetric}>
              <Text style={styles.metricLabel}>Medium Sweet</Text>
              <View style={styles.progressContainer}>
                <View style={[styles.progressBar, { width: "85%" }]} />
              </View>
              <Text style={styles.metricValue}>85%</Text>
            </View>

            <View style={styles.accuracyMetric}>
              <Text style={styles.metricLabel}>Less Sweet</Text>
              <View style={styles.progressContainer}>
                <View style={[styles.progressBar, { width: "80%" }]} />
              </View>
              <Text style={styles.metricValue}>80%</Text>
            </View>
          </View>
        </View>

        <TouchableOpacity style={styles.learnMoreButton}>
          <Text style={styles.learnMoreText}>Learn more about our technology</Text>
        </TouchableOpacity>
      </ScrollView>
    </SafeAreaView>
  )
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
  container: {
    flex: 1,
    backgroundColor: theme.colors.background,
  },
  scrollContent: {
    padding: 20,
  },
  title: {
    fontSize: 24,
    fontWeight: "bold",
    color: theme.colors.text,
    marginBottom: 12,
  },
  description: {
    fontSize: 16,
    color: theme.colors.textMuted,
    marginBottom: 24,
  },
  steps: {
    marginBottom: 24,
  },
  step: {
    flexDirection: "row",
    marginBottom: 16,
  },
  stepNumber: {
    width: 32,
    height: 32,
    borderRadius: 16,
    backgroundColor: theme.colors.yellow[100],
    alignItems: "center",
    justifyContent: "center",
    marginRight: 12,
  },
  stepNumberText: {
    color: theme.colors.yellow[600],
    fontWeight: "bold",
  },
  stepContent: {
    flex: 1,
  },
  stepTitle: {
    fontSize: 16,
    fontWeight: "600",
    color: theme.colors.text,
    marginBottom: 4,
  },
  stepDescription: {
    fontSize: 14,
    color: theme.colors.textMuted,
  },
  accuracyCard: {
    backgroundColor: theme.colors.card,
    borderRadius: 8,
    padding: 16,
    marginBottom: 24,
    ...theme.shadows.sm,
  },
  accuracyHeader: {
    flexDirection: "row",
    alignItems: "center",
    marginBottom: 12,
  },
  accuracyTitle: {
    fontSize: 16,
    fontWeight: "600",
    color: theme.colors.text,
    marginLeft: 8,
  },
  accuracyDescription: {
    fontSize: 14,
    color: theme.colors.textMuted,
    marginBottom: 16,
  },
  accuracyMetrics: {
    marginTop: 8,
  },
  accuracyMetric: {
    flexDirection: "row",
    alignItems: "center",
    justifyContent: "space-between",
    marginBottom: 8,
  },
  metricLabel: {
    fontSize: 14,
    color: theme.colors.text,
    width: "30%",
  },
  progressContainer: {
    height: 8,
    backgroundColor: theme.colors.muted,
    borderRadius: 4,
    flex: 1,
    marginHorizontal: 12,
  },
  progressBar: {
    height: 8,
    backgroundColor: theme.colors.yellow[500],
    borderRadius: 4,
  },
  metricValue: {
    fontSize: 14,
    color: theme.colors.text,
    width: "10%",
    textAlign: "right",
  },
  learnMoreButton: {
    backgroundColor: theme.colors.yellow[50],
    borderWidth: 1,
    borderColor: theme.colors.yellow[200],
    borderRadius: 8,
    padding: 12,
    alignItems: "center",
  },
  learnMoreText: {
    color: theme.colors.yellow[700],
    fontWeight: "500",
  },
})
